010package imagingbook.lib.filter.linear;
011
012import imagingbook.lib.math.Arithmetic;
013
014/**
015 * This class implements a separable 2D Gaussian filter by extending
016 * {@link LinearFilterSeparable}.
017 * 
018 * @author WB
019 * @version 2020/12/29
020 */
021public class GaussianFilterSeparable extends LinearFilterSeparable {
022        
023        /**
024         * Constructor.
025         * @param sigma the width of the 2D Gaussian in x- and y-direction
026         */
027        public GaussianFilterSeparable(double sigma) {
028                super(new GaussianKernel1D(sigma));
029        }
030        
031        /**
032         * Constructor.
033         * Passes {@code null} as kernel to super constructor ({@link LinearFilterSeparable}) if any
034         * sigma &le; 0 or NaN, i.e., the corresponding x- or y-pass is not performed
035         * 
036         * @param sigmaX the width of the 2D Gaussian in x-direction
037         * @param sigmaY the width of the 2D Gaussian in y-direction
038         */
039        public GaussianFilterSeparable(double sigmaX, double sigmaY) {
040                super(makeKernel(sigmaX), makeKernel(sigmaY));
041        }
042        
043        private static GaussianKernel1D makeKernel(double sigma) {
044                if (Double.isFinite(sigma) && sigma > Arithmetic.EPSILON_DOUBLE) {
045                        return new GaussianKernel1D(sigma);
046                }
047                else {
048                        return null;
049                }
050        }
051        
052}
